version_description:
“生日提醒”升級爲“小聰提醒”，支持節日、紀念日、會議、出行等 ，讓您的工作與生活井井有條。
優化性能，操作更順暢。
修複Bug。
提供生日、節日禮物功能。如線上訂購生日蛋糕、中秋月餅等。
修復QQ或微博登錄時閃退的問題。
修改iOS9中的bug

優化提醒編輯界面；
支持多個提醒時間，可添加喝水吃藥提醒；
同一提醒提醒兩次，起床鬧鐘提醒6次，確保您不會忘事；
修復Bugs；
添加快捷提醒。

語音辨識，說一句話自動生成提醒
自動備份，不用擔心資料丟失
支援電話號碼註冊
優化語音辨識體驗，快速、準確聽懂你的語音
支持非專業版恢復數據

•UI revision.
•Simplify the process of adding reminders.
•Calendar display directly reminded, at a glance.
•Add search function.
•Optimize voice recognition function.
•Add the "Skip reminder","Recycle Bin" feature.

v5.1:fix bugs in v5.0.

v5.0 new features:
•UI revision.
•Simplify the process of adding reminders.
•Calendar display directly reminded, at a glance.
•Add search function.
•Optimize voice recognition function.
•Add the "Skip reminder","Recycle Bin" feature.
Fix bugs

Fix bugs.
Add 'Missed Reminder'.
Add 'Mark Completed'.
Raise ringtone volume

Fix crash bug in 5.3.

Features in 5.3:
Add 'Missed Reminder'.
Add 'Mark Completed'.
Raise ringtone volume

1. Adjust the location of the save button:
Change to the bottom right corner of the keyboard.
Change to the bottom right corner of the keyboard.
Change to the bottom right corner of the keyboard.
2, Adaptation iPhoneX, and other intimate changes.

Support lunar for 'Once' & 'Cycle' reminders
Support nap for 'Get up' reminders
Support add reminders on PC
Fix bugs in 'Voice Recognization'

Support widget!
Fix bugs in Backup,Remind Later,Skip Festival

Fit iPhone X.
Right slide to return.
Fix bug: upgrade prompt still displayed even after upgrade
Help users retrieving Pro right after reinstall App
fix bugs
Fix bug: upgrade prompt still displayed even after upgrade
Add a Whole-Point Timing Ring
Fix UI bugs in Dark Mode
Reduce the number of pop-up backup prompts
Widget compatible with night mode
Reduce the number of backup reminders; solve the problem that holidays cannot be updated
Fix bug: Issue of pop-up backup list when auto-backup
Add export data feature
Add bottom tab bar
Fix bug in Widget
Fix tab bar bug
Fix bugs
修复已知问题。

优化主页;
适配iOS14
修复已知的问题
修改已经问题。
